name: Verdant Trail
description:
It started as an ordinary field trip when a quick flash of light and strange symbols engulfs your vision that you find yourself in a world not your own. 

For days, you traverse vast landscapes fraught with numerous dangers and quirky oddities in hopes of finding something – or anyone – familiar. No two worlds are ever the same, except for the mysterious portals that seem to magically exist in very dimension. With every jump into the portal, you hope it would be the last one.

You begin to wonder if it’s even possible to get back home. “What is the Verdant Trail? – Can it really take me back?”

Verdant Trail is a First-Person Puzzle Explorer game where you traverse 3D environments and solve puzzles to progress through the levels. Puzzles are integrated into the environment which encourages the player to interact and explore the area to find the solutions. The puzzles are designed to ramp up in difficulty, so be prepared for a challenge

Game Features:
  • Character Voice Over Narration – Provide Story Elements and Puzzle Hints
  • 2 Unique Environments to Explore
  • Variety of Puzzles for all Skill Levels
  • Ramping Puzzle Difficulty Curve
  • Animated Home Screen
  • Main Menu – Controls, Credits and Music Control
  • Pause Menu
  • Audio – Menu Music, In-Game Music and SFX
